title: Best of the Program | Guest: Frank Siller | 9/12/22
description:
Major credit card companies, including Visa and Mastercard, are making moves to categorize gun and ammunition sales, which could lead to extreme limits on when and where you can purchase guns and ammo. Glenn recalls the 9/12 Project he created and goes through its values and principles to see if they're still admired today. Frank Siller, CEO of the Tunnel to Towers Foundation, joins to express the importance of teaching younger generations about the heroism of September 11, 2001. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
